name: Romper Zombie - Mobile App (Canceled)
blurb: Romper Zombie The Game is a mobile app based on the RZ action figure line. Rush to attack and infect residents without being destroyed!

rewards.reward: ARNS Casualty - That BITES! Here's a "Don't Call Me Daryl!" bumper sticker featuring Zombie Hunter Georgie for your trouble!

NCZT Executive Restroom Key - Always wanted access to the patterned toilet paper? Well, we don't really have that kind of authority, BUT you will receive FOUR limited edition trading cards featuring Romper Zombie characters Andie, Bobbie, Colie and Georgie (Zombie Hunter)!

NCZT Zombie Waste Management Specialist - Get a limited edition poster with artwork featuring Romper Zombie characters and the mayhem of Badger City! Autographed by Romper Zombie creator Luke Vaan-Horne.

NCZT Zombie Disposal Expert - Any 1 (ONE) Romper Zombie T-shirt is yours for the taking!* (Please specify design, size, and shirt color. )

*Available character designs: Andie, Bobbie, Colie, Ernie, Georgie, Hughie, Jayzie, Riplie, Vanitie, and Sgt Budjoe. 
*Available colors include: heather gray, green, light blue, or baseball style with red or blue sleeves. Pink also available for Vanitie.

ZOMBIE BAIT - Chilled to the bone? Well, luckily you get an official Romper Zombie hoodie* featuring either the Zombies or Team Zombie Hunter. Which side will you choose?\r\n\r\n*Please specify size and either Zombie or Team Zombie Hunter design. Hoodies available in Heather Gray only.

WALKING DEAD - Wanna mingle among them? You'll be an official RZ beta tester so you get to play the finished game FIRST. You'll provide essential feedback to ensure Romper Zombie - The Mobile App launches flawlessly!

NCZT Security Officer - You get to choose an 8" resin figure* to be autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne and shipped to your doorstep!
Please specify character. 

*Characters currently available in resin: Andie, Bobbie, Colie, Georgie

Member of Badger City Country Club - You're a little safer now--or are you? Choose an 8" resin figure* to be autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne AND an original RZ illustration**.

*Characters currently available in resin: Andie, Bobbie, Colie, Georgie

**All Romper Zombie characters available for illustration. Please see visit www.ROMPERZOMBIE.com for complete list of characters.

ARNS Coroner Medical Assistant - Things are looking up! You'll be the proud owner of THREE (3) different 8" resin Romper Zombie figures* to be autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne!\r\n\r\n*Characters currently available in resin: Andie, Bobbie, Colie, Georgie

Zombie-Proof Bunker Ticket - Four (4) signed different 8" resin Romper Zombie figures* to be autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne, one (1) RZ hoodie**, and the RZ poster (autographed, of course!). \r\n*Characters currently available in resin: Andie, Bobbie, Colie, Georgie\r\n**Please specify size and either Zombie or Team Zombie Hunter design. Hoodies available in Heather Gray only.

Owner of Badger City Handguns - Receive one (1) of each of the next nine (9) Romper Zombie 8" resin figures as they are released*, each to be autographed by RZ  creator Luke Vaan-Horne.\r\n\r\n*Thirty-one (31) figures total; released once per month.
Owner of Badger City Ammunitions Plant - You will receive a special edition metal box that mimics the Romper Zombie Quarantine Pod.
Next Door Neighbor is Biohazard Survivalist - Five (5) ORIGINAL, one-of-a-kind Romper Zombie illustrations autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne now belong exclusively to you.

Honorary Zombie or Honorary Team Zombie Hunter - No, really! Wanna see what it'd be like? Insert yourself or your child as a character in Romper Zombie - The Mobile App*. \r\n\r\n*Please provide the name, photo, and a short list of interests/hobbies of yourself or your child.

NCZT Top Secret Clearance and ARNS antidote (ONE dose) - Looking for the ultimate guarantee of zombie apocalypse survival? We can't give you that, but we can give you an original illustration of your child or self turned into a Romper Zombie or Zombie Hunter. Your character will then be sculpted and cast to be included in the RZ line for sale on www.ROMPERZOMBIE.com and other retailers nationwide! Plus, you'll receive a hand-painted prototype (cast and painted) autographed by RZ creator Luke Vaan-Horne. \r\n\r\n*Please provide the name, photo, and a short list of interests/hobbies of yourself or your child. Would you like to be a Romper Zombie or Zombie Hunter? What clothing/wound/weapon elements would you like to include?
